message: I propose dividing the money in a 3:1 ratio. I believe this is fair considering the inflation rates and the fact that we are dividing the amount in the first round.
I believe a 60/40 split is fair considering your offer in the first round and the inflation rates. I'm willing to negotiate further if you have another proposal.
Considering the rejection of my previous offer and the inflation rates, I propose a 60/40 split. This maintains a balance while accounting for the decreasing value of money with each round.
